getPixels

int[] getPixels(int[] pixels,
                Grid g,
                int width,
                int height)
Method to calculate the pixels.

Parameters:
pixels - An int array of pixels.
g - The Grid to render.
width - The width of the main canvas.
height - The height of the main canvas.
Returns:
The pixel array, edited with the new render pixels.
